description: Cipher Pol No. 7 (CP7) is one of the World Government's secret intelligence agencies. Wanze serves as a CP7 agent and chef aboard the Puffing Tom.

keyMoments.title: CP7 Guards the Sea Train
keyMoments.description: Wanze, a CP7 agent, appears on the Puffing Tom to guard against infiltrators attempting to rescue Robin.

significance: CP7's presence on the Sea Train adds another layer of opposition for the Straw Hats to overcome in their rescue mission.

description: Cipher Pol No. 9 (CP9) is the World Government's most elite secret intelligence agency, known for their mastery of Rokushiki techniques and their license to kill.

keyMoments.title: Nero Debuts as CP9 Agent
keyMoments.description: Nero appears as CP9's newest member, escorting Robin to Enies Lobby and demonstrating his mastery of four Rokushiki techniques.

significance: CP9's role in kidnapping Robin drives the entire Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs, making them the primary antagonists of this saga.

keyMoments.title: Luffy and Zoro's First Major Combination Attack
keyMoments.description: Luffy and Zoro work together to perform the Gomu Gomu no Sanbyaku Pound Cannon, breaking through the Aqua Laguna to continue their rescue mission.

keyMoments.title: Sogeking Assists the Crew
keyMoments.description: Usopp, disguised as Sogeking, helps Sanji and Franky on the Puffing Tom despite claiming he is no longer part of the crew.

significance: The crew's determination to rescue Robin, even breaking through the Aqua Laguna and with Usopp helping despite their conflict, demonstrates the unbreakable bonds between the crew members.
